tasks.title: Implement chunked transfer
tasks.details:
## Overview
Handle streaming responses

### Implementation
Follow the implementation steps in the task description. Start with a minimal working version, then iterate.

### Key Concepts
- Understand the core algorithm before coding
- Handle edge cases explicitly
- Test against reference implementations
- Profile for performance bottlenecks

### Practice
- [ ] Implement from scratch without references
- [ ] Test with edge cases
- [ ] Compare output with established libraries
- [ ] Optimize for production use

### Completion Criteria
- [ ] Code produces correct output
- [ ] Can explain the implementation to others
- [ ] Edge cases handled properly
- [ ] Performance is acceptable

tasks.title: Build DNS tunnel
tasks.details:
## Overview
DNS translates domain names to IP addresses. Implementation covers: packet parsing, recursive resolution, caching, and handling various record types (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX).

### Implementation
Follow the implementation steps in the task description. Start with a minimal working version, then iterate.

tasks.title: Build double pivot
tasks.details:

Lateral movement techniques allow attackers to spread through a network after initial access. Methods include pass-the-hash, token manipulation, and remote service exploitation.
